tool_description: Get theater ticket pricing/availability in London and NYC.
name: LondonTheatreDirect
title: LondonTheatreDirect

api_list.name: getEvents
api_list.description: Returns all LIVE Events

api_list.name: addTicketsToBasket
api_list.description: Adds provided tickets into basket

api_list.name: checkTicketAvailability
api_list.description: Checks current availability of provided tickets. To get list of existing tickets, use getSingleEventTicket and getEventsTickets

api_list.name: createBasket
api_list.description: Creates new basket. You must call this method first when you have an intention of creating a new order

api_list.name: deleteAllFromBasket
api_list.description: Releases all tickets from basket

api_list.name: deleteOrderFromBasket
api_list.description: Removes order from basket

api_list.name: getCountries
api_list.description: Returns all Countries

api_list.name: getDeliveryTypes
api_list.description: Returns all Delivery types

api_list.name: getEventPerformancesByDate
api_list.description: Returns the same result as getSingleEventPerformances, but performances are filtered by a specified date range

required_parameters.name: dateTo
required_parameters.description: Maximal acceptable date and time of any performance’s occurrence

required_parameters.name: dateFrom
required_parameters.description: Minimal acceptable date and time of any performance’s occurrence. Example 2017-02-24

api_list.name: getEventTypes
api_list.description: Returns all Event types

api_list.name: getEventsByType
api_list.description: Returns all LIVE events of provided type. Use getEventTypes for details

api_list.name: getEventsPerformances
api_list.description: Returns all performances for provided events

api_list.name: getEventsTickets
api_list.description: Returns a set of required events. Result set has size which equals to size of a parsed eventIds parameter. If some event has no available tickets nor any performance within specified date range is found, event instance on specific index is null reference. In case required amount of tickets (i.e. nbOfTickets) is greater than zero, a result contains events with performances having consecutive required amount of tickets available. In case required amount of tickets (i.e. nbOfTickets) equals to zero, a result contains events with performances having any ticket available. Also, found tickets may not be consecutive

required_parameters.name: dateTo
required_parameters.description: Maximal acceptable date and time of any performance’s occurrence

required_parameters.name: consecutiveSeatsOnly
required_parameters.description: flag indicating whether you are Interested only in immediately consecutive seats; parameter is ignored if nbOfTickets equals to zero

required_parameters.name: dateFrom
required_parameters.description: Minimal acceptable date and time of any performance’s occurrence. Example 2017-02-24

api_list.name: getSingleBasket
api_list.description: Returns contents of provided basket (BasketId)

api_list.name: getSingleEvent
api_list.description: Returns information about specified event

api_list.name: getSingleEventBookingInfo
api_list.description: Returns a preliminary booking information of all performances for a specified event. Requires number of tickets requested to properly return minimum and maximum ticket price

required_parameters.name: consecutiveSeatsOnly
required_parameters.description: flag indicating whether you are Interested only in immediately consecutive seats; parameter is ignored if nbOfTickets equals to zero

required_parameters.name: dateTo
required_parameters.description: Maximal acceptable date and time of any performance’s occurrence

required_parameters.name: dateFrom
required_parameters.description: Minimal acceptable date and time of any performance’s occurrence. Example 2017-02-24

api_list.name: getSingleEventPerformances
api_list.description: Returns all performances for a specified event

api_list.name: getSingleEventReviews
api_list.description: Returns reviews for a specified event. By default it returns 10 reviews ordered by created datetime descending

optional_parameters.name: nbFrom
optional_parameters.description: Count of reviews skipped (0 is set by default)

optional_parameters.name: reviewsOrder
optional_parameters.description: Enum ReviewsOrder (0 - DateDescending is set by default)

optional_parameters.name: nbOfReviews
optional_parameters.description: Count of reviews returned (10 is set by default)

api_list.name: getSingleEventTickets
api_list.description: Returns a specified event with all performances within specified date range that contain required amount of tickets available. In case required amount of tickets (i.e. nbOfTickets) is greater than zero, a result contains an event with performances having consecutive required amount of tickets available. In case required amount of tickets (i.e. nbOfTickets) equals to zero, a result contains an event with performances having any ticket available. Also, found tickets may not be consecutive. If no available ticket can be found at all, result object contains a null reference in property called AvailableEvent

required_parameters.name: dateFrom
required_parameters.description: Minimal acceptable date and time of any performance’s occurrence. Example 2017-02-24

required_parameters.name: dateTo
required_parameters.description: Maximal acceptable date and time of any performance’s occurrence

api_list.name: getSinglePerformance
api_list.description: Returns performance detail

api_list.name: getSinglePerformanceTickets
api_list.description: Returns a group of tickets for a specified performance grouped by a ticket area, face and selling price. Result also respects input parameter for required amount of tickets so only areas having this amount available are returned

required_parameters.name: requiredTicketsCount
required_parameters.description: Required amount of tickets to be sold

api_list.name: getSingleVenue
api_list.description: Returns venue detail

api_list.name: getSingleVenueEvents
api_list.description: Returns all online events that are played in a venue having specified id

api_list.name: getSubmittedBasketSummary
api_list.description: Returns contents for provided BasketId only when basket was already submitted

api_list.name: getSystemHeartBeat
api_list.description: Returns true if the web services are available

api_list.name: getTicketPlanPrice
api_list.description: Returns price of TicketPlan refund protection

api_list.name: getUSAStates
api_list.description: Returns all US states

api_list.name: getVenues
api_list.description: Returns all existing venues (theatres, arenas etc.). Result set contains even venues where no event is currently played

api_list.name: submitBasket
api_list.description: Submits basket content

required_parameters.name: failureReturnUrl
required_parameters.description: Destination URL where you get redirected after failure payment

required_parameters.name: successReturnUrl
required_parameters.description: Destination URL where you get redirected after successful payment

required_parameters.name: addressLine1
required_parameters.description: Billing address line 1. Example: 132, My Street

required_parameters.name: sendConfirmationEmail
required_parameters.description: Flag indicating whether to send a confirmation e-mail to a customer

optional_parameters.name: requireTicketPlan
optional_parameters.description: Flag indicating whether a booking insurance should be also created

optional_parameters.name: stateCode
optional_parameters.description: State code, applied only for United States
